name: Roamer (arangel7)
description:
As the Roamer, you embark on a never-ending journey as you wander throughout an unsettling town, but that soon changes when responsibilities start to take over. Random pieces of paper continuously harass the Roamer with tasks to do, the objective is to complete the objectives quickly so that the roamer could return to his journey. If the Roamer was to interact with the pieces of paper scattered across town, they will suddenly be given a task which they must perform such as –

  • Collecting trash around the neighborhood
  • Taking out the trash
  • Mowing the lawn

As tasks get completed more freedom is given to the roamer to explore the unsettling town, each objective has its own unique level and setting for the player to roam.
